img.div:
School Closure/Meal Information
Williams Unified School District #2
Thursday, March 19, 2020

ul.li: School closures are extended through April 10th. AzMerit/AIMS testing is cancelled. Please see the video at: https://azgovernor.gov/governor/news/2020/03/governor-ducey-superintendent-hoffman-announce-two-week-extension-school

li.a: 10 Ways to Manage Symptoms at Home

ul.li: All Arizona Schools are closed through March 27th. This closure could be extended in the coming weeks.
WUSD will be distributing a breakfast/lunch meal Monday through Thursday starting Monday, March 23rd. Any WUSD students are eligible as well as any kid under 18 yrs of age.
Meal distribution will be “drive-thru” style, so as to limit unnecessary contact.

Delivery locations and times are as follows:
>WEMS 10:00-11:00AM
>Shell Station on Hwy 64 10:30-11:15AM
>Maine School (Parks) 10:45-11:30AM
>Valle Travel Stop 11:00-11:45AM
Teachers will be contacting students with work assignments starting March 30th. Both internet and paper assignments will be given. Paper packets will be distributed with meals.
WUSD will stay in contact with students and families as the situation changes. Keep checking this website for information. Call the district office at 928-635-4473 with any questions or concerns.

div.p:
Williams Unified School District #2
636 S. 7th St.
Williams, AZ 86046
